spec_data.Name: perl-Dancer2
spec_data.Description:
Dancer2 is the new generation of Dancer, the lightweight web-framework for
Perl. It is a complete rewrite based on Moo and is meant to be easy and fun.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 18 Oct 2017 04:06:23 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Lightweight yet powerful web application framework
